In accordance with Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2025, we herewith inform you that Ms. Purnima Ashwin Desai, one the Promoters of Aether Industries Limited (the  Company ), pursuant to her notice dated May 12, 2025 and letter dated May 15, 2025 has informed the Company that she has sold 89,79,173 equity shares of the Company having face value of ₹ 10 each, (representing 6.77% of the total issued and paid-up equity share capital of the Company) on May 13, 2025 and May 14, 2025, through an offer for sale mechanism, as annexed.

Purnima Desai has informed the Exchange about an announcement with respect to offer for sale through Stock Exchange Mechanism for sale upto 89,79,173 Equity shares of face value of INR 10/- each of Aether Industries Limited. Date and time of the opening of the offer for Non-Retail Investors: May 13, 2025 at 9:15 a.m.; Date and time of the closing of the offer for Non-Retail Investors: May 13, 2025 at 3:30 p.m.; Date and time of the opening of the offer for Retail Investors: May 14, 2025 at 9:15 a.m.; Date and time of the closing of the offer for Retail Investors: May 14, 2025 at 3:30 p.m. The Sale shall continue to take place on a separate window of the Stock Exchanges commencing at 9:15 a.m. and shall close at 3:30 p.m. (Indian Standard Time) on the same date. The Floor Price for the Offer shall be INR 700/- (Rupees Seven Hundred Only)
